content:
As an AI language model, I can suggest some ways in which the CFL can increase its revenue streams to support its marketing and branding efforts:

1. Explore new advertising and sponsorship opportunities: The CFL could explore new advertising and sponsorship opportunities to generate additional revenue streams. This can involve partnering with major brands across different sectors such as clothing, technology, and entertainment year-round.

2. Increase merchandise sales: The CFL could increase merchandise sales by expanding its product offerings, improving its e-commerce platform and tapping into the trendy apparel industry.

3. Host more league events: The CFL could host more league events such as exhibition games, all-star games, and other events to increase revenue from attendance, media rights, and sponsorships.

4. Increase ticket sales: The CFL could increase ticket sales by offering attractive ticket packages, special promotions, and pricing incentives to loyal fans.

5. Sell broadcasting rights: The CFL could sell broadcasting rights to more media outlets to capture new viewership regardless of physical location.

6. Incorporate new technologies: The CFL could adopt new technologies to enrich the fan experience in gaming, streaming, virtual reality, and data analytics. 

Overall, the CFL could increase its revenue streams for marketing and branding efforts by implementing different strategies to engage fans directly, create new business partnerships and optimize the value of their brand.
